text: Nabiyow yeemeneeh meqe taamoomi Abbaasite mari, Diggah usun jannootay weeqaytitte guba kak gexxa loonumul ken Aytukumus, jannatti caxâ mixuk Yalli Rizqhi keenih Acayinnaanih waqdi, tah duma Yalli neh yecee caxâ mixu iyyan, weelal kee mabla itta kak ceelak keenih yontocowwime Rizqhi tami kak sissinuk, tet Addal (jannoota kinnuk) Agabuy Qaboolaa (mayangali qabal kinnuk) kee wasaakatak Saytunnoowe-lon usun tet Addal waarak
